title: Update engagement rate to 5.2%

requirements.text: In the media kit stats section, update the engagement rate display value from its current number to 5.2%.
acceptanceCriteria: The engagement rate stat in the Media Kit section displays exactly '5.2%'.
All other stats and content remain unchanged.

constraints: Do not change any other content, layout, or styling.
nonGoals: Modifying any other stat or metric value.
Changing backend logic or data models.
Altering any section other than the engagement rate display.
